dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_1_2|Nice weather today.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_1_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Nothing nice is just nice, but what every person prefers. I prefer a bit colder one.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_1_3|You look great in this dress, miss.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_1_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|I that apron? I think your eyes are failing. And secondly, it's 'mrs' not 'miss'.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2_1|They say the clothes dry well today, right?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Yeah, I should go hang it. Goodbye.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2_2|Nice weather today.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Nothing nice is just nice, but what every person prefers. I prefer a bit colder one.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2_3|You look great in this dress, miss.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_2_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|I that apron? I think your eyes are failing. And secondly, it's 'mrs' not 'miss'.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_1|Ah, nice weather today, isn't it? It's been a while since it got as warm.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|True, true, I like it too, though I get thirsty... perhaps...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Everyone just stinks, I like the cold myself.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_2|They say armenian merchants will come by in the afternoon, heard anything of that?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Oh, yes, but they will open the booths tomorrow. I see that you too are waiting, so perhaps...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Maybe, maybe not, who knows with an armenian merchant?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_3|Looks like it'll rain...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|We should look for shelter then, don't you think?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_3_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Really? I'll go get the clothes then.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_1|Spring is in the air, nightingales singing...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Oh yeah, should clean up, but... maybe it can wait...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|The smell? The old woman threw out rotten cabbage. Spring will come - in April.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_2|Excuse me, but  must admit you look charming today...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Thank you sir, nice to hear that from such an esteemed man...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Hah, some seducer you are. Get out of my sight.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_3|Why so miserable miss? Musicians from Zagreb are coming today...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Oh, really? I'd gladly learn more of them before I see them...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_4_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka|Really? Probably perverts and drunkards.
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5_1|Ah, I forgot my sketchbook... what a shame! Full breast, milky face! It should be documented for posterity as a model of beauty...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5_1:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Ah, a real artist! Let me touch or I won't believe it... ah, perhaps... elsewhere?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5_2|What a miracle... what a goddess has visited this miserable world. Human thought can barely comprehend, the charm, the gift, what force would send such wonder, such spell... Ah, no description by Man could hope to do it justice...
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5_2:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Ah, a real poet! Let me touch or I won't believe it... ah, perhaps... elsewhere?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5_3|Excuse my boldness, but seeing you, I thought you need some entertainment... this evening the city will be visited by a troupe from Frankfurt, what would you say to an offer to accompany me?
dlga_uwodzenie_mieszczanka_5_3:uwodzenie_mieszczanka_check|Excuse me, but we don't know each other well enough... but it would be worth to change that.
